  • Classes in eu.europa.esig.dss.spi.x509.revocation used by eu.europa.esig.dss.cades.validation
    Class
    Description
    MultipleRevocationSource
    This interface allows to retrieve all revocation data for a given certificate.
    OfflineRevocationSource
    Represents a revocation sources for a data obtained from an offline source (e.g. signature)
    RevocationSource
    This interface allows revocation data retrieving for a given certificate.

  • Classes in eu.europa.esig.dss.spi.x509.revocation used by eu.europa.esig.dss.service.crl
    Class
    Description
    JdbcRevocationSource
    Abstract class to retrieve token from a JDBC datasource
    OnlineRevocationSource
    Sub-interface for online sources of RevocationTokens
    OnlineRevocationSource.RevocationTokenAndUrl
    This class represents an online revocation source reply, containing the extracted RevocationToken and the URL String used to download the token from
    RepositoryRevocationSource
    Allows storing and retrieving of revocation data to/from a repository (e.g. database)
    RevocationSource
    This interface allows revocation data retrieving for a given certificate.
    RevocationSourceAlternateUrlsSupport
    This interface provides a method to retrieve a revocation data with a list of alternative URL access points
    RevocationToken
    Represents a revocation data token

    Represents a revocation data token
    RevocationTokenRefMatcher
    This class is used to validate a revocation reference against a revocation token
